benchmark_details.name: Syn-(QA)2
benchmark_details.overview: Syn-(QA)2 is a collection of two synthetic English QA datasets generated using entity perturbation on Wikidata and HotpotQA, designed to evaluate the effect of false assumptions in both single-hop and multi-hop question-answering tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the effect of false assumptions in question-answering systems and to provide a dataset for testing model robustness against misleading assumptions.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The annotation of false assumptions may lead to dissemination of false claims as part of the datasetâ€™s public release.

data.source: Synthetic questions generated using perturbed relations from Wikidata and HotpotQA.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated based on the binary classification of whether the input question contains a false assumption or not.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in detecting false assumptions.
methodology.validation: The dataset underwent manual verification to ensure question quality.

targeted_risks.harm: Potential dissemination of false claims due to annotation errors
